meanings.sent1: I always miscode my messages and confuse my friends.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to miscode the data when entering it into the system.
meanings.sent3: I miscode my password so often that I can never log in on the first try!
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to miscode the secret message only made it more obvious.
meanings.sent5: The spy's mission was jeopardized when he accidentally miscode the transmission.

meanings.sent1: The miscode in the program caused it to crash unexpectedly.
meanings.sent2: The technician discovered a miscode in the software that needed fixing.
meanings.sent3: The miscode in the recipe made the cake taste like soap!
meanings.sent4: The miscode in the map led the travelers astray.
meanings.sent5: The miscode on the label caused confusion among the customers.
